catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Commentary on Mishnah (Neziḳin and Ḳodashim)
author: Moses, Maimonides
description: Beginning with Bama Kama chapter 8. Marginal notes containing corrections and two notes (on Hulin chapter 3) of Shmuel ben Mosheh Magrabi. The first chapter of Ḥulin is interrupted by a leaf containing the last two verses of Exodus with Onḳelos and Saadiah's Arabic translation.
